  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:fizleti/120354</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:fizleti/120354</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Gibanje matematičnega nihala in vzmeti</string>
            <string language="en">The Simple Pendulum and Spring Motion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die einfache Pendel-und Frühling Bewegung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le mouvement simple de pendule et de ressort</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O movimento simples do pêndulo e da mola</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il movimento semplice della molla e del pendolo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η απλή κίνηση εκκρεμών και ανοίξεων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El movimiento simple del péndulo y del resorte</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Prikaz nihanja telesa na nihalu in na vzmeti ter povezava med njima.</string>
            <string language="en">Visualization of pendulum oscillation and spring oscillation and differences between these two motions.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">nihalo</string>
            <string language="en">pendulum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">vzmet</string>
            <string language="en">spring</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">periodično gibanje</string>
            <string language="en">periodic motion</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sichtbarmachung der Pendelpendelbewegung und der 
Frühling Pendelbewegung und Unterschiede zwischen diese zwei 
Bewegungen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Visualisation de l'oscillation de pendule et de 
l'oscillation de ressort et différences entre ces deux mouvements.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Visualization da oscilação do pêndulo e da 
oscilação da mola e diferenças entre estes dois movimentos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Visualizzazione di oscillazione del pendolo e di 
oscillazione della molla e differenze fra questi due movimenti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Απεικόνιση της ταλάντωσης εκκρεμών και της ταλάντωσης 
άνοιξη και διαφορές μεταξύ αυτών των δύο κινήσεων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Visualización de la oscilación del péndulo y 
de la oscilación del resorte y diferencias entre estos dos 
movimientos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Pendel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Frühling</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">periodische Bewegung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">pendule</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">ressort</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mouvement périodique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">pêndulo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">mola</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">movimento periódico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">pendolo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">molla</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">movimento periodico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εκκρεμές</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">άνοιξη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">περιοδική κίνηση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">péndulo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">resorte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">movimiento periódico</string>
          </keyword>
